data.name: 洞主
data.text:
Re Alice: There are no study costs for French students during their time at the institution, on the condition that they work for the French civil service for at least 10 of the 15 years following their graduation. Otherwise, they must repay the tuition fees: ...
(École Polytechnique)
和贵清签协议的说法好像也能找到类似的先例
